name: Fiskars Steel Bypass Pruning Shears
description: The Fiskars Steel Bypass Pruning Shears are a must-have for any gardener. These shears are designed with precision-ground stainless steel blades that stay sharp longer, even through heavy use. The low-friction coating helps the blade glide through wood and prevents it from gumming up with sap and debris. The ergonomic handle is designed to reduce hand fatigue and provide a comfortable grip, making it easy to use for extended periods. These shears are perfect for trimming stems and light branches, making your gardening tasks easier and more efficient.

name: Corona Folding Razor Tooth Pruning Saw
description: The Corona Folding Razor Tooth Pruning Saw is an essential tool for any gardener or landscaper. This saw features a 10-inch blade with three-sided razor teeth for efficient cutting. It is designed to cut through branches up to 6 inches in diameter with ease. The folding blade is made of high-carbon Japanese SK5 steel, ensuring durability and sharpness. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, and the blade locks securely into place for safety. This pruning saw is ideal for cutting through green or dry branches, making it a versatile addition to your gardening toolkit.
